name: Fair Table: Uncut Original
description: A low table constructed from unpolished stone and raw White Chestnut Oak Wood. Covered with a purple tablecloth, it exudes a subtle sense of mystery. It can be found at Mol Stone House in Chuwen Fair.\nIt is said that some members of the Masters of the Night-Wind believe that the environment in which materials are crafted can have a significant impact on the end result. As such, they tend to prefer using items that are still in a raw, unrefined state, such as tables that have not yet been meticulously polished...
